title: Composition

title: Composition
text: We need to plug in f(x), or $$x^2+1$$, for the $$x$$ in the function f: $$\sqrt{x^2+1+2}$$.
speech: We need to plug in f(x), or  x squared plus 1 , for the  x  in the function f: , the square root of x squared plus 1 plus 2 end root .

in the function f:  , the square root of x squared plus 1 plus 2 end root

title: Addition
text: We need to add the constants: $$\sqrt{x^2+2+1}=\sqrt{x^2+3}$$.
speech: We need to add the constants:  the square root of x squared plus 2 plus 1 end root is equal to, the square root of x squared plus 3 end root .
